ethuma 1947 pawathi prathama parlimenthu mathiwaranayata beliaththa aasanayen eksath jathika pakshayen idiripath kala apekshakayan dedenagen ek ayeku washayen bandaranayaka mahathage anugamikayek lesa thama wisin ma thora gath ‚Äúatha‚Äù lakunin tharaga wada itha pahadili jayak labagena shri lankawe palamu parlimenthuwe manthriwarayek washayen theri pathwiya.methumage 1945 di aarambha wu deshapalana gamana, pura awurudu 20 ka kalayak akhandawa pawathi athara, ema kalaya shri lankawe deshapalanaye suwishesha saha thiranathmaka sandhisthana kihipayak siduwu wakawanuwaki.ethek jathika deshapalana thalaye aadhipathya daru, dakshinanshika, dhanawadi aarthika prathipaththiyak anugamanaya kala, batahira sanskruthiyata nambauru wu adhirajyawadinta gathikam dakwu eksath jathika pakshayata erehi wikalpa kandayamak lesa nawa nayakathwayak, nawa peramunak saha nawa wedikawak lesa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye bihiwima siduwiya.me nawa peramuna bihiwimath samanga lankawe siyalu jana kotaswala deshapalana ayithiya pulul wi, pradhana prawahayan dekakin thama kamathi pakshayaka ho peramunaka anugamikayan wime niyama prajathanthrawadi ayithiya thahawuru wiya. 1951 di siduwu mema aithihasika siduwimata di. ee. rajapaksha mahatha es.dabliw.aar.di. bandaranayaka mahathage anugamikayek lesa saha pradhana niyamuwaku lesa katayuthu kaleya.1947 pihita wu eksath jathika paksha aanduwe kriyakalapaya gana kalakiri siti bandaranayaka mahatha pramukha, pragathishili sulu kandayam wisin gena yana lada abhyanthara aragalayaka prathipalayak washayen 1951 juli 12 wani dina pawathwu parlimenthu sasiwarayedi bandaranayaka mahatha thaman daru sabhanayaka dhurayath, amathya dhurayath, iwatha la, wipakshayata yamedi, ethuma samaga thawa ek manthriwarayek, pera kathikawakin thorawa, ethumage sewanallak lesa ohu pasupasa gaman kara wipakshaye asun gaththeya.ee manthriwaraya wuye di.ee. rajapaksha mathithumaya.
